snippet: As President Obama prepares to leave the White House, one of his legacies will be the office information technology upgrade that his staff has finally begun.
abstract: White House Letter; Pres Obama and his staff make do with remarkably outdated technology systems in White House and on Air Force One; lag is partially due to balkanization of responsibility between multiple agencies; former Facebook employee David Recordon was hired in 2015 as head of information technology, charged with modernizing White House systems for remainder of president's term and beyond.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama prepares to leave the White House, one of his legacies will be the office information technology upgrade that his staff has finally begun.

headline.main: Technology Upgrades Get White House Out of the 20th Century
headline.print_headline: Technology Upgrades Get White House Out of the 20th Century
